p: The reducing sugar determinations were performed according to Teixeira et al. [ 31] as follows: 0.4 mL DNS solution was added to 0.2 mL sample, then boiled at 100 Â°C for 5 min. The samples were cooled to room temperature in ice, and 1 mL distilled water was added. The absorbance was measured at 540 nm.
